channel.description: Recent content in ROI on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: How do you measure ROI in social media?
item.description: All to often people or companies start using social media but don't know how to measure the return on investment or calculate a payoff from using social media.

item.title: Foursquare usage peaks on the weekend
item.description: Foursquare usage peaks on the Saturday night reports BitsyBot Labs who studied a weeks worth of checkin data from the geo location based mobile social network.
